Privacy Policy
At IPVC MAPS, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and share information to improve your experience with our app.

Information Collection:
We may collect personal details like your name and email when you use our app, as well as device data, IP address, and usage patterns to enhance app performance.

Usage of Information:
Information is used to provide, personalize, and improve our services, communicate with you, and for analytics purposes.

Data Sharing:
We only share information with trusted third-party providers essential for operating our service or as required by law.

Security:
We apply standard security practices to protect your data but note that no method is 100% secure.

User Rights:
You have rights to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us if you wish to exercise these rights.

Terms of Service

Usage:
Use the app lawfully and respectfully. Unauthorized use or abuse of our service may lead to restrictions on your account.

Account Responsibility:
You are responsible for safeguarding your account credentials and any activity under your account.

Intellectual Property:
All app content is owned by IPVC MAPS and is protected under intellectual property laws.

Limitation of Liability:
IPVC MAPS is not liable for any damages or losses arising from the use of our app.
